propList.Name: accept
propList.Description: File types that can be accepted. See input accept Attribute

propList.Name: action
propList.Description: Uploading URL

propList.Name: beforeUpload
propList.Description: Hook function which will be executed before uploading. Uploading will be stopped with false or a rejected Promise returned. When returned value is Upload.LIST_IGNORE, the list of files that have been uploaded will ignore it. Warningï¼šthis function is not supported in IE9

propList.Name: customRequest
propList.Description: Override for the default xhr behavior allowing for additional customization and ability to implement your own XMLHttpRequest

propList.Name: data
propList.Description: Uploading extra params or function which can return uploading extra params

propList.Name: defaultFileList
propList.Description: Default list of files that have been uploaded

propList.Name: directory
propList.Description: Support upload whole directory (caniuse)

propList.Name: disabled
propList.Description: Disable upload button

propList.Name: fileList
propList.Description: List of files that have been uploaded (controlled). Here is a common issue #2423 when using it

propList.Name: headers
propList.Description: Set request headers, valid above IE10

propList.Name: iconRender
propList.Description: Custom show icon

propList.Name: isImageUrl
propList.Description: Customize if render in thumbnail

propList.Name: itemRender
propList.Description: Custom item of uploadList
propList.Type: (originNode: ReactElement, file: UploadFile, fileList: object[], actions: { download: function, preview: function, remove: function }) => React.ReactNode

propList.Name: listType
propList.Description: Built-in stylesheets, support for three types: text, picture or picture-card

propList.Name: maxCount
propList.Description: Limit the number of uploaded files. Will replace current one when maxCount is 1

propList.Name: method
propList.Description: The http method of upload request

propList.Name: multiple
propList.Description: Whether to support selected multiple file. IE10+ supported. You can select multiple files with CTRL holding down while multiple is set to be true

propList.Name: name
propList.Description: The name of uploading file

propList.Name: openFileDialogOnClick
propList.Description: Click open file dialog

propList.Name: previewFile
propList.Description: Customize preview file logic

propList.Name: progress
propList.Description: Custom progress bar

propList.Name: showUploadList
propList.Description: Whether to show default upload list, could be an object to specify showPreviewIcon, showRemoveIcon, showDownloadIcon, removeIcon and downloadIcon individually
propList.Type: boolean | { showPreviewIcon?: boolean, showDownloadIcon?: boolean, showRemoveIcon?: boolean, removeIcon?: ReactNode | (file: UploadFile) => ReactNode, downloadIcon?: ReactNode | (file: UploadFile) => ReactNode }

propList.Name: withCredentials
propList.Description: The ajax upload with cookie sent

propList.Name: onChange
propList.Description: A callback function, can be executed when uploading state is changing, see onChange

propList.Name: onDrop
propList.Description: A callback function executed when files are dragged and dropped into upload area

propList.Name: onDownload
propList.Description: Click the method to download the file, pass the method to perform the method logic, do not pass the default jump to the new TAB

propList.Name: onPreview
propList.Description: A callback function, will be executed when file link or preview icon is clicked

propList.Name: onRemove
propList.Description: A callback function, will be executed when removing file button is clicked, remove event will be prevented when return value is false or a Promise which resolve(false) or reject
